attributes.action: Remove luxury and non essential items from prisons to make prisons more of a punishment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Remove items such as TV's, pool tables etc etc from prisons, and make prisons more of a punishment, rather than a place where many people can live a better life inside than in the general community. Maintain standards of security, hygiene, and health and safety, but remove all non essential items, so that prisons become even more of a deterrant to committing crime.
